question: Please find attached the flow charts of the amendment course registration process
answer: 1. Course amendments (insert-delete) – for registering courses less than or equal to 18 credits. 2. Application to register if course section is full. 3. Application to register more than 18 credits. Please follow the instructions given in the Google form for the above registration process. The insert-delete form can be downloaded from Academic Management Division Website (https://amd.utm.my/files/2020/07/Borang-Pembetulan-Kursus.pdf).

question: School of Mechanical Engineering has decided to conduct all courses via online
answer: School of Mechanical Engineering has decided to conduct all courses via online. This decision has been made, and other faculties are doing the same. However, it is unclear if they will change their decision after December.

NOTICE FOR INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS

For those who want to take the courses of UHIS1022 Philosophy & Current Issues, UHIT2302 Science & Technology Thinking and UICL2302 Thinking of Science & Technology, there are several section for international students:

UHIS1022 – section 58, 59, 70 & 71

UHIT2302 – section 03, 07 & 13

UICL2302 – section 06 & 23

Thank you.
